text: "Get Out" is a 2018 song by the Scottish synth-pop band Chvrches. It is the first single from their third studio album Love Is Dead which was released in 2018. ==Track listing== ==Credits and personnel== Credits adapted from Tidal. * Iain Cook – songwriting, keyboard * Martin Doherty – songwriting, keyboard * Lauren Mayberry – songwriting, vocals * Greg Kurstin – songwriting, production, keyboard, drums, record engineering * Chris Gehringer – master engineering * Michael Freeman – assistant mixing * Mark "Spike" Stent – mixing * Alex Pasco – record engineering * Julian Burg – record engineering ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2018) Peak position New Zealand Heatseekers (RMNZ) 10 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2018) Position US Hot Rock Songs (Billboard) 87 ==Release history== Region Date Format Version Label United Kingdom 31 January 2018 Contemporary hit radio Original Glassnote Various Digital download United States 6 February 2018 Modern rock Various 23 March 2018 Digital download Remixes ==References== Category:2018 songs Category:Chvrches songs Category:Music of Scotland
title: Get Out (song)
